H0.text: Lungs and trachea are organs that belong to the lymphatic system.

H1.text: The spleen and thymus are organs that belong to the lymphatic system.

H2.text: Kidneys and bladder are organs that belong to the lymphatic system.

H3.text: Pancreas and pituitary gland belong to the lymphatic system.

A4.text: The spleen is part of the lymphatic system.

A5.text: The spleen is analogous to a large lymph node.
